2.The Irrelevance of the Neurophysiology of the Brain.In the study of the
mind actual biological facts about actual human and animal brains are
irrelevant because the mind is an “abstract sort of thing” and human
brains just happen to be among the indefinitely large number of kinds
of computers that can have minds. Our minds happen to be embodied
in our brains, but there is no essential connection between the mind
and the brain. Any other computer with the r
